Posts.Content: Not at all!! I had 6 months of chemo, mastectomy, 12 lots of radio and tamoxifen is a walk in the park!!  Hair a bit thin but living again (was bald this time last year).  ||||If you find a brand of tamoxifen that suits you - stick to it!!    Take care you xxx
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen It Sounds Awful Is it Really That Bad?
